packages.title: Explore Grand Vietnam
packages.subtitle: With Phu Quoc & Sapa
packages.description:
Overview

Experience the complete Vietnam journey on this comprehensive 14-day grand tour from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City. Discover Vietnam’s incredible diversity: trek Sapa’s mountain villages, cruise Halong Bay’s emerald waters, explore Hue’s imperial citadel, wander Hoi An’s lantern-lit streets, and experience Saigon’s vibrant energy.

This Vietnam grand tour visits four UNESCO World Heritage Sites while immersing you deeply in authentic Vietnamese culture through daily signature experiences. Trek with ethnic minorities, learn traditional crafts, share meals with local families, and discover hidden gems beyond typical tourist routes. Small groups (max 16), expert local guides, and thoughtfully crafted experiences reveal the real Vietnam.

Duration:14 days, 13 nights

Departure: Daily from Hanoi

Language: Professional English-speaking guides

Style: Complete cultural immersion

VIETNAM GRAND TOUR DESCRIPTION

Complete Vietnam experience

Journey Vietnam’s full length experiencing extraordinary diversity: Sapa’s mountain tribes, Halong Bay’s limestone karsts, Hue’s royal heritage, Hoi An’s ancient charm, and Saigon’s modern energy. Each destination reveals unique cultural treasures.

Four UNESCO World Heritage sites
Explore Vietnam’s most celebrated places with expert guidance: Halong Bay, Hue Imperial City, Hoi An Ancient Town, and My Son Sanctuary. Deep historical insights bring centuries of heritage to life.
Daily signature experiences

Beyond sightseeing, participate in exclusive cultural encounters: Tai Chi with Hanoi locals, fishing with Halong families, Sapa homestay with H’mong tribe, royal tea ceremony in Hue, lantern crafting in Hoi An, meeting war veterans in Saigon. Authentic interactions create unforgettable memories.

Small group advantage

Maximum 16 travelers ensure personalized attention, meaningful local interactions, and flexibility to adjust activities. Unlike large tour buses, our intimate groups connect authentically with Vietnamese communities.

VIETNAM GRAND TOUR IMPORTANT NOTES

Accommodation:13 nights (11 nights 4-star hotels, 1 night premium Halong cruise, 1 night overnight train to Sapa)

Pace:Balanced itinerary with guided cultural activities and 3 free days for independent exploration

What to bring:Comfortable walking/trekking shoes, modest temple attire, layers for Sapa mountains, sun protection, rain jacket, swimwear, camera

Best time:Spring (Mar-May) perfect nationwide; Summer (Jun-Aug) beach season; Autumn (Sep-Nov) harvest festivals; Winter (Dec-Feb) warm south, cool north

Cultural sites:Modest dress required (covered shoulders/knees); shoes removed at temples and homes

Fitness level:Moderate (comfortable walking 4-6 hours; Sapa trekking moderate difficulty)
inclusions: Professional local guides:Expert English-speaking guides throughout with deep cultural knowledge and passion
Complete transportation: Private air-conditioned vehicles, domestic flights (Hanoi-Hue, Hoi An-Saigon), premium Halong Bay cruise, overnight train to Sapa
Accommodation: 13 nights (11 nights 4-star centrally located hotels, 1 night premium Halong cruise cabin, 1 night comfortable train sleeper berth)
Comprehensive meals:13 breakfasts, 11 lunches, 8 dinners (including meals you prepare in cooking classes and homestay meals)
All entrance fees: 4 UNESCO sites, temples, museums, cultural attractions, national parks
Cultural activities: Cooking classes with market tours, traditional craft workshops, water puppet show, temple ceremonies, local family visits
Unique adventures:Halong kayaking/swimming, Sapa valley trekking, dragon boat cruise, lantern floating ceremony
exclusions: International flights:Flights to/from Vietnam (we can assist with recommendations)
Vietnam visa fees:Entry visa costs (e-visa available online for most nationalities)
Personal expenses:Shopping, additional snacks, souvenirs, optional activities during free days
Travel insurance:Comprehensive travel insurance (highly recommended, available through partners)
Tips for guides/drivers:Tipping kitty $180-220 per person recommended but voluntary
Beverages:Soft drinks, alcohol, specialty beverages beyond included meals
Optional activities: Activities chosen during 3 free days, additional excursions

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi
itinerary.description:
'Welcome to the Heart of Vietnam'
Today's Highlight: Authentic Old Quarter Walking Food Safari

Once landed within Hanoi's airport, convenient transportation is provided, escorting travelers toward their lodging in the Old Quarter. A Vietnam vacation gets underway with engaging walking excursions along Hanoi's ancient pathways, including a tour of the celebrated Ngoc Son Temple. Savor truly genuine Vietnamese food while discovering regional culinary customs, characterizing authentic Vietnamese journey experiences.

Accommodation:Four-star hotels provide lodging in Hanoi's vibrant Old Quarter.

Meals:Enjoy delightful Vietnamese cuisine in authentic dining experiences.

Signature Experience:Unforgettable food safaris, revealing hidden gems, are expertly led.

Notes: Comfortable footwear is recommended. Furthermore, respectful attire is required when visiting sacred temples during package explorations.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Cultural Discovery
itinerary.description:
'Discovering Vietnam's Cultural Essence'

Vietnam's deep cultural heritage is best experienced. Mornings begin with Tai Chi, led by experts from Hanoi, at Hoan Kiem Lake. Incredible Vietnam tours include visits to the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, the unique One Pillar Pagoda, a UNESCO site, and the historic Temple of Literature. Vietnamese cuisine is savored through Old Quarter food tours, which include pho and egg coffee. Traditional water puppet shows are enjoyed in the evening, accompanied by meet-ups with puppet masters.

Accommodation: Four-star hotels provide lodging in Hanoi's vibrant Old Quarter.

Meals:Genuine Vietnamese cuisine is included in lunches, traditional dinners, and breakfasts.

Signature Experience:Unique Tai Chi sessions within the community are featured, and puppet workshops will also be given.

Notes: The Mausoleum is closed on Mondays and Fridays.

itinerary.title: Hanoi to Halong Bay
itinerary.description:
'Halong Bay Beckons: An Unforgettable Sunset Fishing Adventure'

A luxurious cruise through the breathtaking, UNESCO-recognized Halong Bay is featured within your Vietnam getaway. Magnificent limestone formations are navigated aboard a top-tier boat while the amazing Sung Sot Cave is discovered. Traditional net-casting methods, passed down across generations, are taught at dusk alongside local fishing communities. Enjoyable swimming and kayaking are experienced before a delectable, freshly-caught seafood dinner is savored as a stunning sunset colors the bay.

Accommodation: Premium cabins with scenic windows are available on the luxury vessel as accommodation options.

Meals:Breakfast, seafood lunch, and fresh-catch dinner are included.

Signature Experience:A traditional fishing lesson from local families is a signature experience.

Notes: Swimwear is recommended for aquatic activities. Weather-contingent experiences and access to the UNESCO site are noted.

itinerary.title: Halong Bay to Hanoi
itinerary.description:
'Discover Halong Bay: An Unforgettable Dawn-to-Dusk Adventure'

Featured Today: Immerse Yourself in Floating Village Culture A serene Tai Chi session at sunrise on deck is experienced as limestone karsts emerge from the horizon. Your Vietnam vacation encompasses exploration of genuine aquatic communities inhabited by generations. Pearl cultivation and eco-friendly fishing techniques are learned from local inhabitants. Subsequently, a comfortable overnight train transit facilitates entry to Sapa's majestic highlands.

Accommodation: Overnight travel via plush sleeping berths to Lao Cai.

Meals:Breakfast is served at a floating village, and a customary midday meal is provided.

Unique Activity:A tea ritual is enjoyed alongside fishing families in their aquatic residences.

Notes:A mountainous climate preparedness kit is furnished; relaxed attire is advised for railway travel.

itinerary.title: Sapa Mountain Adventure
itinerary.description:
'Sapa Adventures: Trek into Scenic Splendor'

Sapa's incredible discovery is now available. Generally, arrival check-in commences at 2:00 PM. A distinctive Vietnam adventure is presented, allowing access ahead of time to impressive rice paddies. Professional photography guidance is delivered, promising magnificent pictures. A fascinating mountain heritage is experienced through an educational tour of Cat Cat settlement. Guests are greeted by native H'mong clans. An age-old weaving showcase is appreciated. A cultural exchange is fostered through an unforgettable homestay experience, complete with a memorable meal.

Accommodation: A mountain hotel exhibiting terrace outlooks.

Meals:Village fare for lunch is provided, along with a hosted meal.

Unique Activity:Photographic mentoring and a weaving class are provided.

Notes: Moderate-intensity trekking is required. Rain protection is crucial. Local traditions must be respected.

packages.title: Vietnam Honeymoon Special
packages.subtitle: Romance in Halong Bay, Da Nang & Phu Quoc
packages.description:
Overview

Celebrate love on a beautifully curated Vietnam Honeymoon Special designed exclusively for couples seeking romance, relaxation, and unforgettable moments. This journey blends breathtaking natural beauty with luxury stays, private experiences, and intimate cultural encounters.

From cruising the emerald waters of Halong Bay to romantic candlelight dinners in Da Nang and tranquil beach escapes in Phu Quoc, every detail is crafted to create lifelong memories. Enjoy privacy, personalized services, and dreamy experiences ideal for newlyweds.

Duration: 8 days, 7 nights

Departure: Daily from Hanoi

Style: Romantic luxury & leisure
highlights: Golden Bridge at Ba Na Hills
inclusions: Private transfers: Airport pickups, intercity transfers in private air-conditioned vehicles
Luxury accommodation: 7 nights in handpicked 4 & 5-star romantic resorts and hotels
Meals: Daily breakfast, selected romantic dinners, honeymoon cake & wine
Experiences: Private Halong Bay cruise, sunset cruise, couple spa session
Sightseeing: All major attractions with private guide
Special touches: Room decoration, flower arrangements, honeymoon surprises
exclusions: International flights: Flights to and from Vietnam
Tips: Optional tipping for guides and drivers

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi – Romantic Welcome
itinerary.description:
'Love Begins in Vietnam'

Upon arrival in Hanoi, enjoy a private transfer to your romantic hotel. The evening is free for a leisurely stroll around Hoan Kiem Lake followed by a cozy candlelight dinner.

Accommodation: Luxury hotel in Hanoi

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Hanoi to Halong Bay Cruise
itinerary.description:
'Sail into Romance'

Embark on a luxury Halong Bay cruise. Enjoy kayaking, limestone views, sunset moments on deck, and a private candlelight dinner under the stars.

Accommodation: Luxury cruise cabin

Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner

itinerary.title: Halong Bay to Da Nang
itinerary.description:
'From Seas to Sands'

After sunrise Tai Chi and brunch onboard, transfer to the airport for Da Nang. Evening at leisure by the beach.

Accommodation: Beachfront resort

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Ba Na Hills & Golden Bridge
itinerary.description:
'Iconic Love Moments'

Ride the world-famous cable car to Ba Na Hills, walk hand-in-hand across the Golden Bridge, and explore the charming French Village.

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Da Nang to Phu Quoc
itinerary.description:
'Island Escape'

Fly to Phu Quoc and check into your romantic beach resort. Enjoy sunset views and beachside relaxation.

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Phu Quoc Leisure & Spa
itinerary.description:
'Relax & Reconnect'

A leisurely day with a complimentary couple spa session and free time on the beach.

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Phu Quoc Sunset Cruise
itinerary.description:
'Love at Sunset'

Enjoy a private sunset cruise with drinks and romantic music, creating picture-perfect honeymoon memories.

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description:
'Until Next Time'

After breakfast, transfer to the airport with unforgettable honeymoon memories.

Meals: Breakfast
